oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Livin', Lovin', & Losin': Songs of the Louvin Brothers
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Louvin Brothers; Louvin, Charlie, 1927-2011;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Two color window card (red and black on white) announcing Livin', Lovin', and Losin': Songs of the Louvin Brothers, a tribute album with guest vocalists including Glen Campbell, Johnny Cash, James Taylor, Emmylou Harris, Alison Krauss, Vince Gill, Merle Haggard, Linda Ronstadt, Dolly Parton, and others.
